DOC.brief_summary: This Randomized , open-label , 2 group , parallel design .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial YMC017 Hypertensive Hypercholesterolemic Patients With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This study objective compare safety efficacy fix dose combination ( Duowell® tab ) free pill combination therapy Telmisartan Rosuvastatin hypertensive hypercholesterolemic patient metabolic syndrome .
DOC.criteria: Aged 19 79 year old screening visit Subjects use antihypertension drug Lipid lower agent 4weeks randomization . Subjects diagnose metabolic syndrome accord follow criterion Definition patient metabolic syndrome : Patients satisfy two follow criterion least Abdominal obesity : Waist measurement > 90 cm ( male ) , > 80 cm ( female ) Triglyceride ( TG ) ≥ 150 mg/dL ( HighDensity Lipoprotein Cholesterol ( HDLC ) < 40 mg/dL ( male ) , < 50 mg/dL ( female ) Fasting Plasma Glucose ( FPG ) ≥ 100 mg/dL Subject use oral hypoglycemic agent Childbearing potential woman certainly negative pregnancy test screen visit ( visit 1 ) , agree implement effective contraception study period ( include medically nonpregnant state ) Subjects sign fully understanding purpose , content , characteristic risk investigational product get explain enough . Subjects take antihypertension drug three agent Subjects mean Sitting Systolic Blood Pressure ( siSBP ) > 160 mmHg ( exclude appliable , one arm ) Subjects blood pressure ≥ 140/90 mmHg take 2 antihypertension drug ( except arm ) Subjects Low Density LipoproteinCholesterol ( LDLC ) n't properly control accord National Cholesterol Education Program Adults Treatment Panel ( NCEP ATP ) III criterion Subjects triglyceride ( TG ) ≥ 400mg/dL Subjects difference 20mmHg mean Sitting Diastolic Blood Pressure ( siSBP ) measure three time arm . Other exclusion apply
